availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ripley, Ohio, house carpenter. Vermont native. Married to Philadelphia Wheeler Palmer in Wallingford, Vermont, on September 27, 1831. Father of George S. Palmer, James H. Palmer, Sarah J. Palmer, Mary J. Palmer, and Clinton C. Palmer. House carpenter in Ripley in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley, p. 214.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley, p. 353B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Mortality Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Ripley, p. 1 (p. 17 of 23 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Vermont, U. S., Vital Records 17 - 1908, Marriages and Births Prior to 1870, Palmer, Ai-Parker, C, p. 660 of 4063 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
